Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Irving Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Irving Park due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Irving Park due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.
